q: My friends would say that I am cautious.
I prefer my money to be safe from risk.
I have put money in a risky investment.
I have experienced considerable gain from a risky investment.
I have been extremely risky in my past with financial investments.
Even if I could get high returns, I would prefer not to invest my money in something that might decline in value.
Being financially cautious is important to me
I would never make a high-risk investment.
Maximising long-term investments is my goal, and I would be willing to accept dramatic, short-term drops in value to achieve this.
